text: Boris Viktorovich Nikonorov (; born 13 April 1989) is a Russian beach soccer player. He is the all-time leader by number of goals for Lokomotiv Moscow, where he plays since 2017. == Achievements == Some of Nikonorov's notable achievements: ===As player=== ====Beach soccer clubs==== * Russian National Championship: 2017 * Russian Cup: 2018, 2017 * Mundialito de Clubes: 2017 ====Beach soccer national team==== * Euro Beach Soccer League: 2017, 2016 * Beach Soccer Intercontinental Cup: 2016 ====Individually==== * 2017 BSWW Rising StarРоссиянин Никоноров признан "восходящей звездой" пляжного футбола по версии BSWW == References == ==External links== * Profile on Beach Soccer Russia Category:Russian beach soccer players Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Yaroslavl
title: Boris Nikonorov (beach soccer)
